head.title: File:Flag of Cameroon.svg - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 15:18, 5 October 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 15:10, 5 October 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 12:06, 11 July 2006

td.span: (exact star in center, recode, desc, same colors, same licensing)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 07:55, 9 April 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 01:34, 28 March 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 01:23, 28 March 2006

td.span: (Smaller star as commonly used ‒ the constitution only specifies a golden star, could be small or big, on a red stripe with a green one on the left and a yellow one on the right.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:33, 27 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Cameroon. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Cameroon)
